show.title: Thalli Pogathe S - 2
show.sharing_text: हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा
show.sharing_text_v2:
हेलो! मैंने Kuku FM (Android)  पर यह शो सुना और मुझे यकीन है कि आपको भी यह जरूर पसंद आएगा। 
https://links.kukufm.com/z4N9P9
show.description: A young college professor must balance his secret marriage to a student while navigating academic politics, past relationships, and helping his sister find love, all while keeping their relationships hidden from prying eyes.
show.description_secondary: A young college professor must balance his secret marriage to a student while navigating academic politics, past relationships, and helping his sister find love, all while keeping their relationships hidden from prying eyes.
